quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Drew Carey and Character
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, appearance, christa. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Christa Miller, who plays Kate on the Drew Carey Show, also plays this character on the sitcom Scrubs.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Jordan

questions.question: Susan Saint James makes a guest appearance as Kates mother in one episode of The Drew Carey Show. In what way are they related in real life?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: She is her aunt.

questions.question: Ruben Studdard beat Clay Aiken by approximately how many votes to win season 2 of American Idol?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 200,000

questions.question: In the sixth season of American Idol, Blake Lewis followed mentor Jon Bon Jovis advice about how to redo Bon Jovis hit song, You Give Love A Bad Name.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: Ryan Stiles, who played Lewis Kiniski on The Drew Carey Show, co-stars with Charlie Sheen on which popular sitcom?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Two and a Half Men

questions.question: What neighborhood tavern do Drew and his friends Kate, Oswald and Lewis frequent on The Drew Carey Show?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Warsaw

questions.question: Which one of these American Idol winners was not dropped by their recording label?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Jordin Sparx

questions.question: Drew Carey (the character) was a bigamist during the The Drew Carey Shows run.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: Finish the lyrics from Moon Over Parma, one of the two theme songs The Drew Carey Show had during its run: Were going bowling, so dont lose her in ............
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Solon

questions.question: How many times was Drew Carey (the character) married during the run of the self-titled show?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 5

questions.question: Which favorite of American Idol sings the hit, Home?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Chris Daughtry

questions.question: What was Drew Careys mothers first name on The Drew Carey Show?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Beulah

questions.question: What is the full name of TV character Dwight Schrute?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Dwight Kurt Schrute III

questions.question: Producer Nigel Lythgoe quit American Idol after season five to further pursue his career in what hit show?

options.text: So You Think You Can Dance

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: So You Think You Can Dance

questions.question: On The Drew Carey Show, Drew, Oswald, Kate and Lewis started a micro-brew beer company to supplement their incomes. What was the name of the beer?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Buzz Beer

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Dwight Schrute and Office
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, actor, mifflin. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: How many seasons did Third Watch run?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 6

questions.question: Dwight Schrute saves this Office character from a physical attack.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Jim

questions.question: What type of farm does The Office character Dwight Schrute own?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Beet farm

questions.question: Why did Angela breakup with Dwight on the sitcom The Office?

options.text: He refused to side with her against Michael.
She felt he did not earn enough money.
He refused to bring her food when she felt ill.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: He killed her cat.

questions.question: Which of these positions did Dwight Schrute not hold officially on The Office?

options.text: Number one paper salesman at Dunder Mifflin

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Assistant Regional Manager

questions.question: Rainn Wilson, who plays Dwight Schrute on The Office, was in 13  episodes of this Rachel Griffiths TV series.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Six Feet Under

questions.question: The Office character Dwight Schrute was a twin.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: TV character Dwight Schrute is very attracted to Angela but he also has a crush on this office worker.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Kelly

questions.question: Faith Yokas and her partner, Maurice Bosco Boscorelli, were patrol cops together until the final season of Third Watch. When did they meet?

options.text: On the first day of high school
On the first day of the Police Academy
They were married before they became a team
While on a mutual friends wedding

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: On the first day of the Police Academy

questions.question: When was actor Rainn Wilson born?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 1966

questions.question: What is the religion of Rainn Wilson, the actor who portrays Dwight Schrute on The Office?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Bahai

questions.question: Which best describes Dwights paternal grandparents on the TV show The Office?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Amish

questions.question: What year did the first episode of Third Watch air on NBC?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 1999

questions.question: Which is untrue about Dwight Schrutes mothers family?

options.text: His maternal grandfather lives in Argentina.
His grandfathers last name was Mannheim.
His maternal grandfather fought for Germany in WWII
His maternal grandmother still lives in Utah.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: His maternal grandmother still lives in Utah.

questions.question: Besides his income at Dunder Mifflin and his farm, what other source of income does TV character  Dwight Schrute have?

options.text: He is a part time fireman.
He runs a Bed and Breakfast

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: He runs a Bed and Breakfast

A journey into a wondrous land, whose boundaries are only that of ________________... youre entering... the Twilight Zone...
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: the imagination
